# stopTransmitting(channelUUID:)

**Instance Method**

Stops an audio transmission with the channel identifer you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
func stopTransmitting(channelUUID: UUID)
```

## Parameters

- **channelUUID**: The channel identifier.

## Discussion

If successful, you receive a callback from [doc://com.apple.pushtotalk/documentation/PushToTalk/PTChannelManagerDelegate/channelManager(_:channelUUID:didEndTransmittingFrom:)] with `PTChannelTransmitRequestSource.programmaticRequest`; otherwise, you receive a failure reason through [doc://com.apple.pushtotalk/documentation/PushToTalk/PTChannelManagerDelegate/channelManager(_:failedToStopTransmittingInChannel:error:)].

## Starting and stopping transmission

- **requestBeginTransmitting(channelUUID:)**: Begins an audio transmission with the channel identifer you specify.
- **setAccessoryButtonEventsEnabled(_:channelUUID:completionHandler:)**: Maps supported accessory button events to actions that begin and end transmission.
